name: Omanyte

abilities.name: Clairvoyance
abilities.text: Your opponent plays with his or her hand face up. This power stops working while Omanyte is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Water Gun
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Omanyte but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

flavorText: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically resurrected from fossils.

strengths: Clairvoyance reveals opponent's hand for perfect information
Water Gun scales with extra energy
weaknesses: Evolves from Mysterious Fossil, not a Basic

competitiveHistory: Omanyte's Clairvoyance power was unique and powerful, providing perfect information about the opponent's hand. This information advantage was significant for planning plays. However, the 40 HP and fossil evolution requirement limited its competitive viability.

rulings.ruling: Clairvoyance forces your opponent to play with their hand revealed at all times while active.
If Omanyte becomes Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed, the opponent can hide their hand again.
Multiple Omanytes don't provide additional effects - one is enough to reveal the hand.
